sentence.Network_en: Objective : To research the chemical compositions of alcohol extraction from Psidium Guajava L.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 研究水番桃叶乙醇提取物的化学成分,为开发该药用资源提供科学依据.

sentence.Network_en: The antibacterial activity of the extract from Psidium againstbacteria was studied by disk diffusion method.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用纸片扩散法对番石榴叶提取物进行体外抗菌试验研究,以了解其抗菌谱.

sentence.Network_en: OBJECTIVE To study human leukocyte elastase ( HLE ) inhibitor constituents from Psidium guajava L.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的研究番石榴叶中的人白细胞弹性蛋白酶 ( HLE ) 抑制剂成分.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 番石榴是番石榴属（Psidium）植物形态特征：常绿小乔木或灌木，高 5～12m，没有直立主干，根系发达。单叶对生，叶背有绒毛 …

list.abs: experiment foliage application of taiwan psidium guajava limn ., 台湾珍珠芭乐叶面施肥试验.
